original_title: Bela Lugosi Meets a Brooklyn Gorilla
overview: The Singer Duke Mitchell meets Sammy Petrillo in this parody of Martin & Lewis. They arrive on a jungle island, where a mad scientist played by Bela Lugosi makes human esperiments.
tagline: A horror film that will stiffen you with laughter!
title: Bela Lugosi Meets a Brooklyn Gorilla
